intro: Freziera neei, commonly known as the silver leaf plant, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves that have a silvery underside. The plant produces showy, pink to purple flowers that bloom in summer. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to care for in moderate climates. Freziera neei prefers well-drained soil and full sun to partial shade.
